text: @here any one know what things to be take care before  the HubSpot theme sent for marketplace publish ?
This question might be better for this channel. Please help!! :pray:
Hi <@U022FJKR4CQ>!! On line 25 try changing elif to else?

GREAT NEWS!! Okay, so when I changed that line in the base html all the errors changes to be more specific (weird?) and said that it couldn't find child_links in "false", so for every macro that called a menu item I wrapped it `{% unless menu_item == "false" %}` and that worked!!!!! Omg you have no idea how long I have been fiddling with this. I appreciate yalls help so much!
